Service requests generally refer to something, that the user wants or needs but does not yet have. Many of the service requests are actually small changes – low risk, frequently occurring, low cost, etc. – and affect only the person making a request, or a subordinate group of employees. Examples include password resets, individual PC upgrades, new employee setup,
